apple.desc: **A fruit. It is crunchy, but soft nontheless.**

burger.desc: **A layered meal made commonly of a grounded beef patty between two loaves of bread.**

shovel.desc: **A stick with a metal plate welded to one end. The plate is slightly indented making it decent for picking up loose materials.**

medkit.desc: **A small package with everything you need to heal any wound.**
